name = localhost
root = /var/www/localhost
port = 80,443
user = www-data
group = www-data
index = index.html,index.htm
error_page = error.html
error_page_404 = 404.html
error_log = /etc/log/voy/errors.log
access_log = /etc/log/voy/access.log
workers = 5

vhost {
    name = mydomain.com
    port = 8081
    root = /var/www/mydomain.com/public
    index = index.html
    error_page = error.html
    error_log = /etc/log/voy/mydomain.com.log
    access_log = /etc/log/voy/mydomain.com.log
}

vhost {
    name = example.com,www.example.com
    port = 8081
    root = /var/www/mydomain.com/public
    index = index.html
    error_page = error.html
    error_log = /etc/log/voy/mydomain.com.log
    access_log = /etc/log/voy/mydomain.com.log
}

vhost {
    name = test.com,www.test.com,www.test.com
    port = 8081
    root = /var/www/mydomain.com/public
    index = index.html
    error_page = error.html
    error_log = /etc/log/voy/mydomain.com.log
    access_log = /etc/log/voy/mydomain.com.log
}
